original_text:
Book of Cats
Di solito le slot a tema egizio vedono come protagonisti le divinità e i simboli più famosi, come Ra o Horus. In questa slot a firma BGaming invece la protagonista è Bastet, la dea gatta ventata dagli egizi sin dai tempi antichi. Il gatto era infatti un animale sacro tenuto con ogni cura e regolato da leggi specifiche. Infatti, chi osava fargli del male o decideva di portarlo al di là del Nilo, fuori dalla regione, veniva punito con la pena di morte!
Per rendere al meglio il carattere mitologico della slot, la BGaming si è impegnata nella creazione di una grafica favolosa sotto ogni punto di vista. Dai simboli super definiti, alla cura dei dettagli, ogni aspetto grafico di questa slot ha il potere di farci immergere in un’atmosfera magica. La griglia di gioco, posizionata sulle rive del Nilo in una giornata assolata, ha 5 bracieri alla base che si accendono quando si attiva una funzione speciale. Al di sotto di essi ci sono i tasti principali e poche altre informazioni, così che la funzionalità del gioco risulta più fluida e più intuitiva. Questo non vuol dire che non siano presenti altre impostazioni, semplicemente sono nascoste e accessibili attraverso il tasto menù.
Caratteristiche della slot
In base alla situazione di gioco, la griglia ha due dimensioni. Durante il gioco base ha 5 rulli e 3 righe, con un sesto rullo bloccato tranne che per una cella. Durante i Free Spins quest’ultimo rullo si sblocca e la griglia diventa una 6×3.
Le linee di pagamento sono 10 e fisse e si vince allineando dei simboli a partire dal primo rullo a destra e avanzando verso sinistra.
La puntata minima è di 0,01 € a linea, ciò vuol dire che uno spin costerà appena 0,10 €. Nulla vieta comunque di aumentare la nostra puntata a piacimento sino a un massimo di 10 €.
Si possono attivare da dieci giri automatici all’infinito.
L’ RTP è del 94%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Anche in Book of Cats abbiamo i classici simboli di basso valore buoni per una scala reale, quindi dal dieci all’asso. La croce con la testa di gatto vale molto di più, arrivando a pagare sino a 1.000 volte la puntata, stesso valore dilla maschera da gatto. La tessera con il fatto vale sino a 2.500 volte la puntata, mentre la dea Bastet arriva a ricompensarci con 7.500 volte.
Il libro dorato ha la doppia funzione di Wild e Scatter. Nel primo caso sostituisce tutti i simboli, nel secondo ricompensa con 10 Free Spins. A questo punto vedremo sbloccare il sesto rullo. Durante i Free Spins un simbolo del tutto nuovo sarà a espansione, ossia si estenderà per uno o più rulli, regalandoci tantissime combinazioni vincenti.
In Book of Cats c’è anche la possibilità di usufruire della funzione Gamble per raddoppiare l’ultima vincita o perderla completamente.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Cats

Usually, Egyptian-themed slots feature gods and the most famous symbols like Ra or Horus. However, in this BGaming signature slot, the protagonist is Bastet, the cat goddess worshipped by ancient Egyptians. Cats were sacred animals, and they were regulated by specific laws. Whoever dared to harm them or take them across the Nile outside of their region was punished with the death penalty!

To enhance the mythical character of this slot, BGaming has worked hard in creating fabulous graphics that are captivating in every way. From the highly defined symbols to the attention to detail, every visual aspect of this slot has the power to transport us to a magical atmosphere. The game grid, located on the banks of the Nile on a sunny day, has five braziers at the base that light up when a special feature is activated. Below them are the main buttons and a few other information, making the game functionality more fluid and intuitive. This does not mean that other settings are not present; they are simply hidden and accessible through the menu button.

Slot Features

Depending on the game situation, the grid has two dimensions. During the base game, it has five reels and three rows, with a sixth reel locked except for one cell. During the Free Spins, this last reel unlocks, and the grid becomes a 6×3.

There are 10 fixed paylines, and you win by aligning symbols starting from the first reel on the right and advancing towards the left.

The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, meaning that one spin will cost just €0.10. You can increase your bet up to €10 if you wish.

You can activate 10 automatic spins to infinity.

The RTP is 94%.

Symbols and Functionality

Even in Book of Cats, there are the classic low-value symbols that are good for a royal flush, ranging from ten to ace. The cross with the cat's head is worth much more, paying up to 1,000 times the bet, the same value as the cat mask. The card with the fact is worth up to 2,500 times the bet, while the goddess Bastet rewards us with up to 7,500 times.

The golden book has a dual function as Wild and Scatter. In the first case, it replaces all symbols; in the second case, it rewards you with 10 Free Spins. At this point, the sixth reel is unlocked. During the Free Spins, a totally new symbol will expand, occupying one or more reels, giving us numerous winning combinations.

In Book of Cats, there is also the opportunity to use the Gamble feature to double the last win or lose it completely. 

As an experienced gambler, you will undoubtedly appreciate the mythical and captivating graphics of Book of Cats, as well as its numerous features and significant rewards. Give it a try and immerse yourself in the magical world of ancient Egypt and its feline deities!

Review: Book of Cats

Usually, Egyptian-themed slots feature gods and the most famous symbols like Ra or Horus. However, in this BGaming signature slot, the protagonist is Bastet, the cat goddess worshipped by ancient Egyptians. Cats were sacred animals, and they were regulated by specific laws. Whoever dared to harm them or take them across the Nile outside of their region was punished with the death penalty!

To enhance the mythical character of this slot, BGaming has worked hard in creating fabulous graphics that are captivating in every way. From the highly defined symbols to the attention to detail, every visual aspect of this slot has the power to transport us to a magical atmosphere. The game grid, located on the banks of the Nile on a sunny day, has five braziers at the base that light up when a special feature is activated. Below them are the main buttons and a few other information, making the game functionality more fluid and intuitive. This does not mean that other settings are not present; they are simply hidden and accessible through the menu button.

Slot Features

Depending on the game situation, the grid has two dimensions. During the base game, it has five reels and three rows, with a sixth reel locked except for one cell. During the Free Spins, this last reel unlocks, and the grid becomes a 6×3.

There are 10 fixed paylines, and you win by aligning symbols starting from the first reel on the right and advancing towards the left.

The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, meaning that one spin will cost just €0.10. You can increase your bet up to €10 if you wish.

You can activate 10 automatic spins to infinity.

The RTP is 94%.

Symbols and Functionality

Even in Book of Cats, there are the classic low-value symbols that are good for a royal flush, ranging from ten to ace. The cross with the cat's head is worth much more, paying up to 1,000 times the bet, the same value as the cat mask. The card with the fact is worth up to 2,500 times the bet, while the goddess Bastet rewards us with up to 7,500 times.

The golden book has a dual function as Wild and Scatter. In the first case, it replaces all symbols; in the second case, it rewards you with 10 Free Spins. At this point, the sixth reel is unlocked. During the Free Spins, a totally new symbol will expand, occupying one or more reels, giving us numerous winning combinations.

In Book of Cats, there is also the opportunity to use the Gamble feature to double the last win or lose it completely. 

As an experienced gambler, you will undoubtedly appreciate the mythical and captivating graphics of Book of Cats, as well as its numerous features and significant rewards. Give it a try and immerse yourself in the magical world of ancient Egypt and its feline deities!

response.headline: Unleash the Feline Fury: Gameplay Mechanics and Features!
response.content:
Get ready to embark on a thrilling journey with Book of Cats, a fun-filled online slot brought to you by BGaming. This game is packed with excitement and has two different grid dimensions, which keeps the game fresh and entertaining. With 10 fixed paylines, players have the opportunity to win big with each spin.

The minimum bet per line is only €0.01, so for those who are on a tight budget, this is the perfect game. On the other hand, high-stakes players can bet up to €10 per line, meaning there’s something for everyone! You never know, you might get lucky and land on a wild symbol, which will significantly increase your chances of winning.

During the base game, the grid has five reels and three rows, but that’s not all! Once you trigger the Free Spins feature, a sixth reel unlocks, and the grid transforms into a 6×3. Suddenly, the pace starts to pick up, and the excitement level goes through the roof! With an extra reel, players have more chances of landing on big wins and multipliers.

If you think that’s all, think again! The golden book symbol in Book of Cats not only replaces all symbols on the reels but also serves as a Scatter, triggering one of the game’s most exciting features- 10 Free Spins! Land three or more book symbols on the reels, and let the Free Spins feature commence! Enjoy the thrill of spinning the reels for free, as you watch your winnings pile up.

All in all, Book of Cats has plenty to offer, with its unique gameplay mechanics, and exciting features that keep you hooked for hours. Plus, with its impressive graphics and animations, Book of Cats is a feast for the eyes. Come and join the fun, and see for yourself why this game is a crowd-pleaser. Who knows, you might just hit the jackpot, and be able to afford a few extra cat toys for your feline friends!

meta.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Book of Cats".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay

Book of Cats has a 5x3 (and 6x3 during free spins) game grid with 10 fixed paylines. The minimum bet is €0.01 per line (€0.10 per spin), and the maximum bet is €10. The game also includes an autoplay feature and a Gamble feature to double wins.

Graphics

BGaming has put a lot of effort into creating immersive and captivating graphics in Book of Cats. The symbols and game grid are highly defined, and attention to detail helps transport players to a magical world. The game grid is located on the banks of the Nile on a sunny day, and there are five braziers at the base that light up when special features are activated.

Bonus Features

Book of Cats includes several bonus features to help players increase their winnings. The golden book serves as both a Wild symbol, replacing all other symbols, and a Scatter symbol, rewarding players with 10 Free Spins. During Free Spins, a new symbol expands, creating additional winning opportunities. The game also includes a Gamble feature that allows players to double their last win or lose it completely.

Payouts

Book of Cats offers payouts for aligning symbols starting from the first reel on the right and advancing towards the left. The low-value symbols are the classic royal flush from 10 to ace. The higher-value symbols include the cross with the cat's head (1,000x bet), the cat mask (1,000x bet), the card with the face (up to 2,500x bet), and the goddess Bastet (up to 7,500x bet).

Minimum Bet

The minimum bet in Book of Cats is €0.01 per line, meaning one spin will cost €0.10. Players have the option to increase their bet up to €10. The game also includes an autoplay feature for up to 10 spins.

faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Book of Cats".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Book of Cats

Usually, Egyptian-themed slots feature gods and the most famous symbols like Ra or Horus. However, in this BGaming signature slot, the protagonist is Bastet, the cat goddess worshipped by ancient Egyptians. Cats were sacred animals, and they were regulated by specific laws. Whoever dared to harm them or take them across the Nile outside of their region was punished with the death penalty!

To enhance the mythical character of this slot, BGaming has worked hard in creating fabulous graphics that are captivating in every way. From the highly defined symbols to the attention to detail, every visual aspect of this slot has the power to transport us to a magical atmosphere. The game grid, located on the banks of the Nile on a sunny day, has five braziers at the base that light up when a special feature is activated. Below them are the main buttons and a few other information, making the game functionality more fluid and intuitive. This does not mean that other settings are not present; they are simply hidden and accessible through the menu button.

Slot Features

Depending on the game situation, the grid has two dimensions. During the base game, it has five reels and three rows, with a sixth reel locked except for one cell. During the Free Spins, this last reel unlocks, and the grid becomes a 6×3.

There are 10 fixed paylines, and you win by aligning symbols starting from the first reel on the right and advancing towards the left.

The minimum bet is €0.01 per line, meaning that one spin will cost just €0.10. You can increase your bet up to €10 if you wish.

You can activate 10 automatic spins to infinity.

The RTP is 94%.

Symbols and Functionality

Even in Book of Cats, there are the classic low-value symbols that are good for a royal flush, ranging from ten to ace. The cross with the cat's head is worth much more, paying up to 1,000 times the bet, the same value as the cat mask. The card with the fact is worth up to 2,500 times the bet, while the goddess Bastet rewards us with up to 7,500 times.

The golden book has a dual function as Wild and Scatter. In the first case, it replaces all symbols; in the second case, it rewards you with 10 Free Spins. At this point, the sixth reel is unlocked. During the Free Spins, a totally new symbol will expand, occupying one or more reels, giving us numerous winning combinations.

In Book of Cats, there is also the opportunity to use the Gamble feature to double the last win or lose it completely. 

As an experienced gambler, you will undoubtedly appreciate the mythical and captivating graphics of Book of Cats, as well as its numerous features and significant rewards. Give it a try and immerse yourself in the magical world of ancient Egypt and its feline deities!
